title: 20 RIOT POINTS
body: Ciao ragazzi mi servono 20 riot points per prendere una skin, voi dite che il supporto potrebbe darmeli?

replies.body: Contatta direttamente il supporto e vedi se possono fare qualcosa. Via forum non possiamo fare nulla :)

hey dude plz do reply to me, I need answers,I'm a player in eune and if i want to buy a package should i buy it using euro or dollars !, and what if I don't get the RP, would i be able to get my money back,I'm gonna buy a 50$ package so plz do reply riot, or any other player

> [{quoted}](name=Shuxan DS,realm=EUNE,application-id=98NGV4Al,discussion-id=i2UZd4Rp,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-10T04:43:36.650+0000)
>
> hey dude plz do reply to me, I need answers,I'm a player in eune and if i want to buy a package should i buy it using euro or dollars !, and what if I don't get the RP, would i be able to get my money back,I'm gonna buy a 50$ package so plz do reply riot, or any other player

Open the shop and check which currencies are available. I don't think you could buy in dollars anyway.

By the way, this is the italian board. If you want to write in english you should use the english one.
